TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseDataEnvironment : IDisposable, msdatasrc.DataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract BaseDataEnvironment extends System.Object implements class msdatasrc.DataSource, class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataEnvironment Implements DataSource, IDisposable
public ref class BaseDataEnvironment abstract : IDisposable, msdatasrc::DataSource

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 在已經從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級的應用程式中模擬 Visual Basic 6.0 。

span.span: Emulates a Visual Basic 6.0 in applications that have been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，資料繫結表單時自動建立拖曳資料庫項目從`Data Environment`拖曳至表單。In Visual Basic 6.0, data-bound forms were automatically created when you dragged database elements from a `Data Environment` onto a form. `Data Environment`處理 Visual Basic 6.0 及 ADO 資料層之間的所有對應。The `Data Environment` handled all the mapping between Visual Basic 6.0 and the ADO data layer. 當應用程式升級為 Visual Basic 中，`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a , and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familynewslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
